testcase.name: The Edit portal can allow user to update First Name
testcase.skipped: Given user go to GMI home page..............................................passed And user click sig in button................................................passed And user enter valid username...............................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click sign in button...............................................passed And user click my operation.................................................passed Then user click manage Customer.............................................passed Given user is on Create or edit a Customer page.............................undefined And user updates first name as "Tom"........................................undefined And user clicks Edit button.................................................skipped Then verify first name is "Tom".............................................undefined
